Articles.Content: as the wiki page states you need to have a understanding of the forces at play to get the most out of your turboprop i want to use the kal-1000 to dynamically change my angle of attack relative to my air speed but cant find a way to do so. alternatives are welcome because i cant find any way to change the attack angle passively that would be effective.

56 minutes ago, LLL is my hero said:

i want to use the kal-1000 to dynamically change my angle of attack relative to my air speed but cant find a way to do so.

Well, you are not alone in wanting to do that...

...and also not alone in not being able to do that.

Sorry, but any input into a KAL-1000 only comes (directly or indirectly) from user input. There is not way to feed any kind of sensor input into the control. (Well, no way without using user interaction.)
any alternatives to effectively change AOA without user interaction mods or otherwise
Well, I keep the PAW of one of the propeller blades open during flight, and manually adjust blade pitch as needed (via an action group, of course).

50 minutes ago, AHHans said:

Well, I keep the PAW of one of the propeller blades open during flight, and manually adjust blade pitch as needed (via an action group, of course).

You can use the KAL to limit blade pitch within a usable range and the assign the play position to a control (like UP/DN or such).
Allowing for easier control.
